Package org.dllearner.learningproblems

Interface Summary
DefinitionLP Marker interface for definition learning problems.
InclusionLP Marker interface for inclusion learning problems.
 

Class Summary
EvaluationCache Caches results of previous concept evaluation to speed up further evaluations.
PosNegDefinitionLP The aim of this learning problem is to learn a concept definition such that the positive examples and the negative examples do not follow.
PosNegDefinitionLPStrict  
PosNegInclusionLP The aim of this learning problem is to find an appropriate inclusion axiom given positive and negative examples.
PosNegLP  
PosOnlyDefinitionLP Definition learning problem from only positive examples.
PosOnlyInclusionLP  
PosOnlyLP  
RoleLearning Here are just some code snippets, which can be used The basic algorithm is simple: input: 1. domain or range 2. number of instances n choose domain or range of a role Positive Examples: get the first n instances of domain or range Negative Examples: get the first n instances of range or domain The Queries can be found in SPARQLqueryType
ScoreThreeValued Computes the score (a negative value) by comparing the classification results with ideal results.
ScoreTwoValued TODO: accuracy-Berechnung (positive+negative Beispiele muessen dafuer bekannt sein)
 

Enum Summary
PosNegLP.UseMultiInstanceChecks If instance checks are used for testing concepts (e.g. no retrieval), then there are several options to do this.
ScoreThreeValued.ScoreMethod
